flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: Saferays provides MagicJack Plus to remove the biggest issues we found in the original Magic Jack. That telephony gadget offered solid, reliable phone service for a price that was hard to beat, but required you to leave the gizmo plugged into your PC--as
guide.title: Free Call to Canada & U.S. With MagicJack Plus India
